title: Ordered sums in a monoid
content: One important use of words is as formal composites in cases where order is significant, using the general sum operator ~ df-gsum . If order is not significant, it is simpler to use families instead.

blocks.name: gsumvallem2
blocks.content: Lemma for properties of the set of identities of ` G ` . The set of identities of a monoid is exactly the unique identity element. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumvallem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wceq(c1, csn(c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  eqssd(c1, csn(c2), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  mgmidsssn0(s0, s1, c0, cmnd, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  snssd(c2, c1, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(c2, c4, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, c2), cv(s1)))))
  mndidcl(c0, c2, c3)
  ralrimiva(s1, c3, wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wceq(co(c2, c4, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, c2), cv(s1))))
  mndlrid(c0, cv(s1), c3, c2, c4)
  elrab2(s0, c2, c1, c3, wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(c2, c4, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, c2), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  ovanraleqv(s1, cv(s0), c2, c3, cv(s1), c4, cv(s1), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(c2, c4, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), cv(s1), co(c2, c4, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c2, c4, cv(s1))
  diff.cmnd.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cmnd)
  diff.cmnd.s(s1)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(c2, c4, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, c2), cv(s1))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(co(c2, c4, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, c2), cv(s1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c2, c4, cv(s1)), cv(s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, c4, cv(s1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(cv(s1), c4, c2), cv(s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), c4, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumvallem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Mnd → c1 = { c2 })
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 = { s0 ∈ c3 | ∀(s1 ∈ c3,((s0[c4]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c4]s0)= s1))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  eqssd(c1, { c2 }, c0 ∈ Mnd)
  mgmidsssn0(s0, s1, c0, cmnd, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  snssd(c2, c1, c0 ∈ Mnd)
  sylanbrc(c0 ∈ Mnd, c2 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,((c2[c4]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c4]c2)= s1)))
  mndidcl(c0, c2, c3)
  ralrimiva(s1, c3, c0 ∈ Mnd, ((c2[c4]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c4]c2)= s1))
  mndlrid(c0, s1, c3, c2, c4)
  elrab2(s0, c2, c1, c3, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,((c2[c4]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c4]c2)= s1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c3,((s0[c4]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c4]s0)= s1)))
  ovanraleqv(s1, s0, c2, c3, s1, c4, s1, (s0[c4]s1)= s1, (c2[c4]s1)= s1)
  eqeq1d((s0[c4]s1), s1, (c2[c4]s1), s0 = c2)
  oveq1(s0, c2, c4, s1)
  diff.cmnd.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cmnd)
  diff.cmnd.s(s1)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, c3, ((c2[c4]s1)= s1 ∧(s1[c4]c2)= s1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c2[c4]s1)= s1, (s1[c4]c2)= s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c2[c4]s1), s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, c4, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (s1[c4]c2), s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, s1, c4, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: gsumsubm
blocks.content: Evaluate a group sum in a submonoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumsubm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c2, cgsu, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c3, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, cress, c5))
} = {
  gsumress(hs0, c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), c5, cmnd, c3, c4, cfv(c0g, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c5, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c5, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  submss(c5, c0, cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c5), wcel(c5, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  subm0cl(c5, c0, cfv(c0g, c0))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c0g, c0)), cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c5, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  submrcl(c5, c0)
  mndlrid(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumsubm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum]c1)=(c2[gsum]c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈(SubMnd ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c3 → c5))
  ⊣ c2 =(c0[|`s]c5)
} = {
  gsumress(hs0, c0, c1, c2, (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0), c5, cmnd, c3, c4, (0 ` c0), w0)
  syl(w0, c5 ⊆(Base ` c0), c5 ∈(SubMnd ` c0))
  submss(c5, c0, (Base ` c0))
  syl(w0, (0 ` c0)∈ c5, c5 ∈(SubMnd ` c0))
  subm0cl(c5, c0, (0 ` c0))
  sylan(w0, hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), (((0 ` c0)[(+ ` c0)]hs0)= hs0 ∧(hs0[(+ ` c0)](0 ` c0))= hs0), c0 ∈ Mnd)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Mnd, c5 ∈(SubMnd ` c0))
  submrcl(c5, c0)
  mndlrid(c0, hs0, (Base ` c0), (0 ` c0), (+ ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c((0 ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: gsumz
blocks.content: Value of a group sum over the zero element. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c3)), c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  gsumval1(hs0, hs1, c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c3), c3, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), cmnd, c1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2))
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c3, crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c3, crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))))
  syl5eleqr(c3, crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), csn(c3), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  snid(c3)
  fvexi(c3, c0g, c0)
  gsumvallem2(hs0, hs1, c0, crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), c3, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))
  diff.wral.s(s0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cplusg, c0)
  diff.cplusg.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cmnd)
  diff.cmnd.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

thm gsumz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3))= c3)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  gsumval1(hs0, hs1, c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), c3, (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0), { hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)| ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0),((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)= hs1 ∧(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)= hs1))}, cmnd, c1, c2, (c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  simpl(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpr(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ c2)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c3, { hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)| ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0),((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)= hs1 ∧(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)= hs1))}, (c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ { hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)| ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0),((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)= hs1 ∧(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)= hs1))})
  syl5eleqr(c3, { hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)| ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0),((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)= hs1 ∧(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)= hs1))}, { c3 }, c0 ∈ Mnd)
  snid(c3)
  fvexi(c3, c0g, c0)
  gsumvallem2(hs0, hs1, c0, { hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)| ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0),((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)= hs1 ∧(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)= hs1))}, c3, (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  eqid({ hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)| ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0),((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)= hs1 ∧(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)= hs1))})
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, (Base ` c0), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0),((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)= hs1 ∧(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)= hs1)))
  diff.wral.s(s0, hs1, (Base ` c0), ((hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)= hs1 ∧(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)= hs1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)= hs1, (hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0)= hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1), hs1)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, (+ ` c0), hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs0), hs1)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs1, (+ ` c0), hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cplusg, c0)
  diff.cplusg.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cmnd)
  diff.cmnd.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: gsumwsubmcl
blocks.content: Closure of the composite in any submonoid. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumwsubmcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c0))), wcel(co(c1, cgsu, c2), c0))
} = {
  pm2.61ne(c2, emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c0))), wcel(co(c1, cgsu, c2), c0), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c0))
  eleq1d(co(c1, cgsu, c2), c0, cfv(c0g, c1), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  syl6eq(co(c1, cgsu, c2), cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cgsu, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  oveq2(c2, emptycls, c1, cgsu)
  gsum0(c1, cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqeltrd(co(c1, cgsu, c2), c0, cfv(cseq(nat0, cfv(cplusg, c1), c2), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c0))), wne(c2, emptycls)))
  gsumval2(c1, c2, nat0, cfv(cplusg, c1), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1), cfv(cbs, c1), cmnd, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c0))), wne(c2, emptycls)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  submrcl(c0, c1)
  fssd(c2, co(nat0, cfz, co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)), cfv(cbs, c1), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c0))), wne(c2, emptycls)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  submss(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  seqcl(hs0, hs1, nat0, cfv(cplusg, c1), c2, co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c0))), wne(c2, emptycls)))
  syl6eleq(co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, nat0), cn0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c0))), wne(c2, emptycls)))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c0))), wne(c2, emptycls)), wcel(co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1), cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, c2), cn))
  nnm1nn0(cfv(chash, c2))
